title: Glove: Manned Orbiting Laboratory (MOL), Military Hamilton, Version 7 (MH-7), "X-ray of a spacesuit", 1968
medium: Steel, anodized aluminum, brass, nylon, HT-1 Nomex, Velcro, rubber/Neoprene with flocked fiber coating, Sharkskin, PVC
markings:
RIGHT GLOVE: Handwritten on interior velcro tab:
008
S (illegible) 72164 (illegible)
D-1
AA4-1

Etched on wrist disconnect:
AL Logo
ASSY 9156 SN-101
9S

Molded into zipper pull:
TALON
creditline: Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum, Transferred from NASA, 1973.0860.003
description: The gloves were made with a rubber/neoprene interior bladder, with nylon exterior layer and sharkskin pads on the fingers.
type: Glove: Manned Orbiting Laboratory (MOL), Military Hamilton, Version 7 (MH-7)

participants.person_name: National Air & Space Museum, Smithsonian Institution
